name: Dungeon Survival
storyline: Black Haze is a border town renown for its rich mineral deposits, which has fallen on hard times of late. In this city, it is difficult to tell the difference between good and evil. Following the mysterious disappearance of the former lord, the fragile balance of the city is disrupted. You are Royde, and you have been chosen by the king to bring balance back to Black Haze and investigate the strange reports that have come from the city.
summary: Cave levels are randomly generated, providing a new experience each time you play! Hundreds of monsters to defeat, equipment to collect, and quests and achievements to conquer! Enchant, Reform, Level up, and collect Gold! An abundant new world to explore! Featuring 9 classes, each with unique skills. Build your party however you choose.
